We ended up extending our stay here for an additional 2 nights as we loved it so much. All staff we came across were so polite and helpful. 

The breakfast included was lovely, not to mention the fantastic view from the restaurant looking out to the beach.

Rooms were clean, and very well presents, although a bit of the small side. Not much of a view from the window as hotel is located between two buildings, but wasn't really an issue as we barely spent any time in the room other than to sleep.

The location was also perfect. Short walk to the busy strip of bars/restaurants and a bike would take you round to the other side of the island to watch the sunset in 15-20mins. 

I would highly recommend for friends/couples looking for the best of both worlds on a trip to Gili T!

text: I booked a 2 night stay at this lovely hotel at the end of May. There was three of us staying and we booked using Expedia. I emailed the hotel a week before our stay to confirm our room and that it would accommodate for three people. The hotel replied back stating we would have to pay extra for the extra bed. I answered stating that on expedia they had specified the price for three people- to which I received the same response. I rang up expedia and notified them what had happened and it was only after expedia contacted them to raise the situation did they respond back to me stating that I would not have to pay extra. So I would highly recommend people booking for three people in one room to confirm with the hotel beforehand in order to avoid any stress on arrival. Bar from this, the staff; room and hotel restaurant were great (we booked it with a 20% off food promotion). There was maintenance work during our stay but this didn't seem to bother as us much since we're early risers and spent most days by the sea, Might be an issue for others though and is not clearly advertised on their website that there is heavy maintenance work going on.
title: Lovely staff but double check!

text:
I've gone around the island and compared to most accommodations that I have seen, Natya surely have most of the best features: near to the fast boat stop, night market, convenient store, party area, diving school, basically all facilities in the island. 
I suggest to stay in the ocean view room to get best out of it.

If I can add some suggestions:
1. Hotel should work on the wifi. During my 2 nights stay, I couldn't easily connect my gadgets. And when it did, it doesn't run really fast -- even sometimes slower than mobile data.
2. Breakfast: pay more attention to food quality (as some of the fried food were left soggy) and maybe you can add more options?
3. Room service: improve product knowledge of the staffs. I once asked "what's inside sauteed vegetables?", and the staff answered "it's basically vegetables" xD of course I knew. I did elaborate my question, but then the staff said he will call me again after he  asked the chef. He came back few minutes later but still didn't give specific answer, something along "it consists of A, B, and other stuff too.".

Yet overall, it was a pleasant stay and I would recommend this hotel to friends and readers.
title: Just need a few improvement. But overall, 4.5/5!

text:
The hotel is located in the main beach strip of Gili Trawangan, which is a short walk (less than 5 minutes) from the main Gili Trawangan Jetty and the daily night market.  The hotel was tucked away from the main beach strip.  There is a convenience store and Billabong store at the front of the hotel facing the main beach strip.  There are many restaurants to choose from, you will be spoilt for choices.  The swimming pool is beautiful and inviting. Overall it is a small property but is tastefully decorated, well kept and beautiful.

My first experience of Natya Hotel was with the staff who were very helpful and informative when I called in to arrange airport transfer for our group.  They were service oriented, accommodating and pleasant.  The pick-up at the airport, the transfer from Lombok Airport and check-in were all very welcoming.  Almost all of them spoke English.  

My superior room was well designed, functional and was all you needed on a beach holiday - a comfortable bed with pillows, sheets and air-conditioning.  The bathroom was clean had hot water for bathing, toiletries and hairdryer.  My room also came with coffee, tea, an electric kettle and safe deposit box.
 
The breakfast spread was limited but the food was tasty.  There was 3 types of cereal served with cold milk, sorry no yogurt.  There was either fried rice or noddles, a chicken dish and some vegetables, your typical Indonesian breakfast spread.  Thankfully, there was also some cakes, fresh sliced fruits, Danish pastry, croissant served with butter and jam.  There was always 2 types of fruit juices.

Overall, our group enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again at Natya Hotel if we were back in Gili Trawangan.
title: Small gem tucked away in Paradise!

text:
We booked to stay in the Natya for four nights. On check in our room was not ready so we had lunch and sat in the seating in the hotel. Service was so slow that we ended up ordering through reception as our waiter disappeared. After eating both of us felt very ill which at the time we both put down to having just come off the boat to gili and the heat. However after spending the next two mornings on the toilet after breakfast we both realised it was the food so gave up with hotel breakfast and found elsewhere on the Island. 
However the hotel itself is fabulous. Pool is shady during the day so a great way to cool down and stay out of the sun if needed. Location is amazing, just a short walk to everything you need. Plus the beds were very comfy.
title: Good Hotel, Bad Food

text: Natya hotel is fairly priced for gili strandards, new ,clean,friendly reception,small but clean pool,cozy rooms! We had checked into this hotel after a tiring boat ride from Bali and we were so happy that we had choose this hotel. Its located in the best part of gilli T where all the bars and restaurants are. The hotel restaurant looked really nice with a great view of the beach . Super friendly receptionist very good keep it up! Small but clean rooms and well designed island themed with comfortable beds . New hotel and well maintained , great location , walking distance fron the dock . Breakfats was very good as you have an option to take from the buffet and also order from the menu with generous portions . Over all great hotel would come back for sure . Although if you want a later checkout or even if you checkout at 12 would be better to inform in advance as they start calking and asking when are you checking out by 11 am which i found abit annoying.
title: Probably one of the best in gili

text:
Supernice little hotel with great location! Close to the the bars if you want to go out at nights, far enough to be able to sleep without inconvenience. Walking distance from harbour (5 mins with fully packed large backpack). Nice rooms, you have everything you need. Pool is really nice and clean. There is a minimarket in the same building and it's open 24/7. 
Restaurant is at the beach, so the hotel does not have any loungers or beacharea, where you could spend time (many other places in 5 min. walking distance). Restaurant is nice and food is good. At breakfast you can order one warm dish and then there is buffet where you can get cereal, juice, coffee, toast and fruits. I was totally happy about the breakfast.
Room was nice. Comfortable bed, enough space to storage your stuff and totally ok bathroom. Terrace was a bit disappointment, tiny place where you can take your towel to dry and that's about it. The view was next building's wall... So if you want a balcony, you need to book room with seaview. 
And then the staff. Really nice, always willing to help, always smiling and polite. I didn't have any problems with anything at this hotel. Felt totally safe and comfortable. Same thing at restaurant, such nice staff. No wonder that the restaurant was packed every night. I would like to thank the whole staff of making my stay so enjoyable. I will not forget this hotel and all the lovely people. And if I'm able to return to Gili next year, I surely will return to Natya Hotel.
title: Great location!

text:
Natya Hotel Gili Trawangan is a small hotel but clean, simple and fresh. I like the touch of blue in each room interior, it reflects the freshness of tropical and island life. My room, deluxe ocean view has an amazing view to the ocean. Sitting on the room terrace is even more delightful, especially in the morning when Gili Trawangan is still quiet. 
Breakfast were served in Natys Restaurant across the hotel, just right in front of the beach with relaxing white wash tropical interior. The breakfast was ala carte, but they have like 6 or 7 options of breakfast package so that you can have different breakfast everyday.
The location of the hotel is convenient, only around 15 minutes walk from the harbour. Shops, restaurants and spas are only within walking distance.
title: Great option to stay in Gili Trawangan

text:
For the amount of parties that occur on Gili Trawangan this hotel was extremely comfortable and relaxing to wind down at. The staff was extremely kind and the rooms were really homey. Surprisingly for the volume of music that plays at the small bars around the hotel, the room was absolutely sound proof. You couldn't hear anything outside and could easily fall asleep and rest for the next day. 
Although there are a couple of drawbacks in this hotel itself, the staff was friendly yes, but the staff was also a little lazy. As I was walking up to my room they didn't turn on the light of the staircase or the hallway on the second floor. It was already dark outside, which had made the trip to my room very inconvenient. On the way up I had to use my cellphone as a flashlight in order for me to get to the second floor safely. If it ever happens to you, there is a light switch on the left at the top of the staircase. Speaking of lights, the lighting in the bedrooms and restrooms were a little dark. As they use yellow light throughout for a relaxing feel, the bathroom only had one yellow light bulb, causing the shower to be really dark. I understand it was apart of its ambiance, but it was really inconvenient to get ready in the morning as well as to wash up, as you could barely see anything.
But the location of the hotel was really convenient, it was only a 20 minute walk or 10 minute bike ride to watch the sunset, 10 min walk from the docks, and there was food all around the hotel, not to mention that Billabong was located right next to it as well, making it convenient for any last minute shopping sprees. 
Overall the stay at this hotel made my trip more relaxing, as it felt more as a vacation at home.
title: Great staff, decent food, comfy room

text:
I stayed here for a couple nights whilst on Trawangan and can confidently say that this is the very best hotel I have stayed in on the island (visited 4 times already!) - 5 star service from this beautiful hotel. 

Perfectly located on the beachfront, just a couple minutes walk from the harbour, night market and popular restaurants. 

Room was cute and represented incredible value for money, particularly given that the delicious breakfast was included in the price (you simply must try the eggs benedict!)

What really made my stay so special (and prompted me to write this review, as normally i'm too lazy) were the wonderful staff. They were so accommodating and friendly from start to finish. Honestly, the best service I've ever experienced at a hotel. Big shout out to MUKIM at reception who kept me entertained for hours whilst my partner was taking her mid-day naps.

Just book it now to guarantee an extra magical stay on Trawangan! 😁
title: Big thank you to Mukim and all the staff for making my stay in Trawangan so special! ❤️

text:
Stayed here for 4 nights. Hotel was clean, but the bed sheets were stained.  most of the staff are really friendly, rooms quite small and air con was awful. Can be quite noisy at night (not a lot the hotel can do about it), no view from the rooms and no fridge in the room. Breakfast was ok, twice daily housekeeping which is good 

We had the NYE meal/party which was ok. It Was a good atmosphere. It was great to see the staff celebrate at midnight. Dani our server was brilliant and ended up servings us serval nights, he remembered our names, drinks and food order and was always very polite and helpful. If it wasn’t for him I wouldn’t of scored this place as high. He’s a credit to this place 

One night we had a meal (very average for the price) I asked to pay on card and the women didn’t show me the amount before I entered my pin which was strange. She wasn’t fond on giving me a receipt and passed it to me screwed up behind my card, she walked away and i checked the receipt, she had charged me 200,000 MORE! I said excuse me and as soon as I said it she turned towards us, her face dropped and she immediately said “oh I’ve charged you too much” before I even mentioned it. she said she couldn’t do a refund even though I saw the option on the machine, she was making quite a bit off fuss and delaying refunding us, she wanted to “void the transaction” I kicked up quite a fuss and another lady ran over with 200,000 cash. 

Be very careful when paying on card at this place. 

Some things need attention to them, I would probably stay elsewhere if I returned to Gili T
title: Be careful with card payments.

text:
Naty‘s Restaurant by the harbor is a very romantic spot with amazing service and high food quality standards spearheaded by chef Surya. During our one week stay in Gili T we ate at Naty‘s everyday after our happy discovery of the restaurant:) 
Highly recommend their Nasi Goreng and mixed Satay for lunch and the BBQ land and sea set for dinner (enough for party of 2). Must have is the Chocolate lava with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Must have! Service is amazing and we were very well taken care of.
title: Amazing food and the best service!!

text: We stayed here for 1 night and it was perfect for what we wanted. The staff were brilliant, especially Mukim who was really nice and he couldn’t do enough for us. The room was clean and big and the tv had lots of English channels. The bathroom was small but perfect for what we needed and had a cool window into the bedroom. They also provided free water which was nice too. The pool was huge and very clean also. The hotel is located perfectly on the strip of Gili T, surrounded by restaurants and bars. The breakfast was included in the room rate and was very nice and had lots of variety for us both. We were also given discount vouchers for dinner at the restaurant too. We would definitely recommend staying at this hotel!  😊
title: Lovely hotel, perfect location and excellent staff

text:
My daughter and I met in Gili Trawangan after being apart for over two years. We had booked Natya Gili Trawangan online so had no prior knowledge of the hotel.
We were made to feel so special by the beautiful staff from the moment we arrived. Wicca was on the front desk and welcomed us with an icy towel and a big smile. She had given us a room downstairs right next to the pool as we had needed 2 x single beds. The room was clean and tidy and smelt lovely. The beds were super comfortable. Such a great room to stay in for us as my daughter still had to study so we would walk out the door and sit by the pool while she did this. There are power points out there. Nothing was too much trouble. Mazawan, Wicca and the rest of the staff were always extremely attentive and looked after us beautifully. As we were leaving, they all stood in line and hugged us goodbye. A wonderful experience at Natya and one I would recommend to anyone.
title: A fabulous place to stay

text:
This is our first time to visit Gili Island. And me and family was so curious about the island.
We arrived Gili by speedboat from Senggigi, and was cost us IDR 300,000 to have it private so that we can go anytime and it took only 10 minutes. We arrived right in front of the Hotel so we do not need to walk. We book the hotel through Online Booking. Gili- It's very unique because there are no cars nor motorbike. We can only take a bycicle ,horse or walk... Which we found this very special Experience. 
We came and checked in to the hotel Natya Hotel ,the receptionist was very friendly and polite. The Room Division Manager Rumadi is very helpful and nice. We feel very welcomed and he also provide information about the island, where to go , to see and gave us information what best spot to see sunset,etc.
Room is very clean, we stayed at Deluxe room, good size,good Wi-fi,good facilities.
We used the bike from the hotel, its available for rental. Kids very excited to ride around the island.
We enjoy sunset at the paradise sunset bar, one of the best spot to see sunset. 
We decided to have dinner at the Natya hotel roof top,as the evening a bit windy by the beach.
The food is good, kids have their seafood pizza, i tried Nasi Goreng and Hubby had his seafood curry soo yummy. Price wise average on the island. The staff Antok is also very friendly. We enjoyed our dinner there. We definitely will come back for Gili Trawangan and Natya Hotel... This trip Awesome... 😊
title: Perfect stay with Family at Natya Hotel Gili Trawangan

text:
My stay at the Natya Hotel was pleasant. It was a comfortable stay and the staff was incredibly friendly. It doesn't do anything outstanding but neither does it do anything disappointing. The room was very clean and modern looking, it had working AC and hot water. There is a pool but it is located right next to reception so there isn't really a sense of privacy as people will constantly be walking by. 
The breakfast was standard but delicious, and in one of my pictures you have a great view of the beach. I would recommend this only if you need a reliable place to stay, as it can be pricey versus other places on the island. It's also on the main strip, but not super close to any of the main clubs so light sleepers will be okay.

There's also a 24 hour supermart right outside the hotel for convenience, and the hotel do their own bike rentals too so getting around the island isn't difficult.

I booked this place last minute for peace of mind, and that is exactly what I got.
title: It does the job and more!

At last out of no choice I made an IDD call to the hotel to cancel. They refuse to cancel and refund my booking. Reason given was my booking is low rate & non refundable. So if you planned to book this hotel with full payment, please beware. They strictly will NOT refund even tsunami happens. A big rip-off.

text: I love to try few accommodations at 1 tour...... To know what the best and what they may offer.Perhaps enjoying the boutique style of accommodation and beach so much made me feel its worth to try this hotel. A little bit isolated for its entrance as it was at the back and facing no where but small swimming pool and lobby. Small alley to reach lobby with kitchen scene on your wright. Been served with welcome drinks and straight away check-in. Surprisingly the room was spacious and good air-conditioned too. Mine was on the top floor (level 3 i think) and facing another resort. Good amenities in house and cozy resort to stay with family and friends. I like this resort as it was a bit quiet then others. Maybe as the resort facing inside the island. Had my dinner here with family and it was in a big portion. the meals served was good and in fusion Indonesian style. My kids enjoy the pool very much and it was open till late night. The people here - staff was very kind and friendly. They never stop asking you "How was your stay with us" - seriously? why? any hidden meaning by that .... after get their answer... they just wanted to make sure we are happy with their hospitality. The interior around this resort was great - combination of wooden arts and iron almost everywhere. This pieces of arts could be another value of this resort for those love and appreciate it. Why no ?......Natya will absolutely another resort suitable everyone.
title: Seriously?.....

They attended to our request immediately. The only letdown is the bathroom smell but I guess it's not their fault as the bathroom itself is clean. The smell might comes from gili water which I heard is a common problem on the island.

Complimentary breakfast is nothing to shout about, portion is small & they don't refill the buffet table. 

Overall, this hotel is highly recommended and definitely worth the price. Just get your lunch/dinner somewhere else :)

text:
Das hotel liegt etwa 10 gehminuten vom hafen entfernt. Ich hatte einen koffer dabei und konnte diesen einigermassen gut zum hotel bringen. Es warten aber auch maultiere oder esel am hafen für den transport zum hotel (keine autos auf gili). 
Das personal ist freundlich. Das zimmer einigermassen sauber. Sie hatten zweimal am tag das zimmer gerichtet. Allerdings auf den 2. blick nicht ganz gründlich. Im bad läuft das wasser aus der dusche, weil der vorhang zu kurz ist. Dieser war im übrigen etwas schimmlig. Das fenster war etwa 1meter von einer wand entfernt. Es war also nicht so hell und kein direktes sonnenlicht. Es hat tv, safe, wasser, klimaanlage, haartrockner im zimmer. Ich hatte über das hotel ein fahrrad für 24h für 60 000 IDR gemietet, auf der strasse erhält man sie günstiger. Auch den halbtages snorkel trip gibt es auf den strassen günstiger als im hotel. Im hotel kostet es 150‘000 IDR, draussen 100‘000 IDR. Das hotel liegt direkt an der „partymeile“, man hört aber vom lärm nichts.  Am strand der auf der anderen strassenseite liegt, stehen etwa 6 Liegen für die Hotelgäste zur Verfügung.
title: Gute Lage

text:
Das Hotel befindet sich ca 5 Minuten entfernt vom Bootsanleger, kann also leicht gegangen werden. Da die Straßen überwiegend aus Sand sind ist man mit einem Rucksack auf den Gilis generell leicht im Vorteil.
Die Anlage ist sehr sauber und das Personal ist ausgesprochen freundlich.
Das Frühstück kann aus einer Karte gewählt werden, es steht aber im Buffet auch immer frisches Obst (Wasser- und Honigmelone) bereit sowie Kaffee, Tee, Saft etc. Sollte etwas fehlen dann wird sich umgehend darum gekümmert.

Obwohl Gilli T die Partyinsel ist bekommt man nur wenig davon mit, hab geschlafen wie ein Stein. Und auch zwischen Hotel und Minarett ist viel Strecke sodass ich kein einziges Morgengebet mitbekommen habe.

Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt!
title: Gute Lage, saubere Zimmer

text:
Wir wurden abends durch ein super Angebot eines Mitarbeiters in das Restaurant gelockt: Eine Fischplatte für 2 Personen mit 200 gr Hummer, Prawns, Squid und Snapper mit Beilagen inkl. zwei Gläser Wein oder Cocktail für ca. 50€. 
Wir haben hier echt viel erwartet da es vielversprechend aussah. Leider wurden wir hier sehr enttäuscht! 
Die komplette Platte war nahezu kalt bis sie auf dem Tisch stand, der Squid war sowas von zäh, der Hummer war halb auf dem Grill verbrannt, die Prawns und der Snapper waren auch alles andere als lecker. Das einzig positive waren die Beilagen die wie ein Buffet aufgebaut waren. Hier gab es verschiedene Salate mit Brötchen, was aber zuvor auch anders in der Karte stand. 
Der Wein war ebenfalls furchtbar. Wir können dies auf keinen Fall empfehlen! 
Wie das dazugehörige Hotel ist, können wir nicht beurteilen da wir im Manta Dive untergebracht waren was mit Abstand unsere Beste Unterkunft war!
title: Restaurant nicht zu empfehlen!

text: Estive hospedada no Natya Hotel de Gili durante o mês de setembro e foi uma grata surpresa tudo que encontramos por lá! Primeiro foi uma tarefa dificílima encontrar hospedagem em Gili, sempre havia algo que me fazia procurar e procurar . Porém resolvi arriscar , já que na ocasião haviam poucas avaliações e dois fatores foram determinantes para a escolha : primeiro a localização central , perto de tudo ( principalmente do porto ) , afinal arrastar a mala por muito tempo não estava nos meus planos , muito menos ir de charrete ( muita dó dos cavalinhos )... o segundo fator foi a piscina , afinal em uma lugar quente , nada melhor que chegar depois do dia na praia e encontrar uma piscina ma-ra-vi-lho-sa nos aguardando. O hotel é facilmente localizado e realmente fica bem próximo do porto , como o restaurante Natya fica em frente e é bem famoso , então se ficar um pouco ansioso (a) e precisar perguntar , todos saberão. Chegamos 12:00 duas horas antes do check in e infelizmente não haviam quartos disponíveis , por isso deixamos as malas na recepção ( visível da rua) e fomos para o restaurante tomar um drink de cortesia , contemplando o mar azul fosforescente que fica de frente . Às 14:00 retornamos e nossas malas já estavam no quarto ( existe apenas 1 andar , desta forma malas pesadas darão um pouco de trabalho , uma vez que serão levadas pela escada). O quarto que ficamos tinha a janela para uma viela , era muito silencioso , o ar condicionado funciona muuuuuito bem e o banheiro , apesar de simples , possuía tudo que precisávamos . Apesar da água ser dessalinizada nem perdemos a diferença , a pressão no chuveiro também era perfeita . Tudo é bem novo nos quartos : a decoração é agradável , a cama muito grande e confortável , só sentimos falta de um frigobar, que fez bastante diferença não haver um . O hotel fica ao lado de um mercadinho ( dos mesmos proprietários ) e os preços são ok. O café da manhã possui opções limitadas ( mas satisfatórias) a la carte , e com um buffet contendo algumas frutas, suco , leite , cereais , etc. A refeição é servida no próprio restaurante e prepare- se para um calor aterrador . A equipe é extremamente gentil , solicita e profissional. Ao contrário dos demais hotéis que pesquisei , o Natya está localizado na melhor região da Gili, onde estão as praias com menos pedras , e mar mais azul , do lado oposto ao famoso por do sol ( mas que possui muito Coral). Definitivamente Gili é tão compacta que quanto menos tempo se locomovendo, afinal existem hotéis q parecem ótimos mas estão longe de tudo , mais ganharemos tempo para aproveitá-la . Uma bela surpresa em Gili T!
title: Bela surpresa em Gili T!

text: Pour trois nuits sur cette petite île. L’hôtel est au coeur de la partie animée de l’Île. ( A 5 minutes à pied de l'embarcadère donc le recours aux CIDOMOS est facultatif ) Très propre. Belle déco moderne utilisant beaucoup le bois. Très bon accueil. Les équipements sont exigus mais bien conçus. Petit balcon avec etendoir avec belle vue sur la mer et LOMBOK. Par contre, ambiance bruyante de rue animée jusqu'au delà de minuit. La plage de sable blanc est à 10 mètres de l'hotel. Le service des repas et petits déjeuners manquent d'efficacité ( lenteur , erreurs dans les commandes ).
title: VUE SUR LA MER ... ET L'ANIMATION DE RUE

text:
Dette hotellet ligger midt i sentrum av øya. Ingen spesiell utsikt, men det har mange andre fordeler. Servicen var supergod og de fikset snorkling til meg uten at jeg trengte å gjøre noe booking selv. 
Rommet var helt enkelt og rent. Prisen var meget god for dette stedet. Passer godt for single og backpackere.
title: Enkelt, sentralt, rent og billig
